name: King Fishing
description:
1. Classic fish species and cool special effects

Classic arcade fish, all kinds of goldfish, featured fish, let you love. In addition, add cool effects, bring a great experience!

2. Arcade fishing creates new gameplay

Retain childhood fishing memories, innovation to join the room theme gameplay, release skills sprint list!

3. Collect free coins daily

There are many free events where you can earn a lot of coins online. Get them in the game!

4. Super High Explosive Rate super Cool Experience

The explosion rate of the whole fishery has increased again, and the game experience is full!

5. The innovation model is waiting for you

Westward journey, warhead play, Mecha play, Haidilao play, let you love.
